sentences.en: It was a three-year water irrigation project.
sentences.cn: 这是一项为期三年的灌溉工程。

sentences.en: I was on a three-year contract that expired last week.
sentences.cn: 我签订的三年期合同已于上周期满。

sentences.en: Closure of the hospitals was phased over a three-year period.
sentences.cn: 这些医院的关闭是在三年期间逐步进行的。
